text: Elelwani is a 2012 South African romantic drama movie directed by Ntshavheni wa Luruli and was based on the novel by Titus Ntsiene Maumela. It stars Florence Masebe, Vusi Kunene, Mutodi Neshehe, Sammy Moeti. ==Other websites== * Category:2012 romantic drama movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in South Africa
title: Elelwani
